title: Great Visit
text: The price of entry was well worth the visit! The scenery from the top, the ancient buildings and history... amazing! Friendly people, and the food is tasty and affordable

title: Delphi and Thermopylae full day tour.. great trip!
text: We had a private tour in a very nice and comfortable vehicle.. just the driver, my wife, and me. The price was not much more than a full bus tour would have cost, and we had the ability to stop anywhere we wanted, and stay as long or as little as we wanted. The driver did a great job.. loved the snow covered mountains, countryside scenery, ruins of Delphi, and so much more. I was glad we went to the site of the Sparta/Persian battle of Thermopylae, but wish they had more at the location. It was just a couple of monuments. I think they are loosing out on a GREAT area to have a museum and doze/excavate the battlefield so that it would be easier to imagine what the battle might have been like. Athens in general is a great place visit.. the food is inexpensive and delicious. The people are friendly, and we felt safe. Molon Labe!!
